channel.title: What's your favorite game of all time?
channel.description: Well, what is it then? For me it's Half Life, and once Black Mesa comes out it will be my favorite.

item.title: What's your favorite game of all time?
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
Rossman:

HOLY FUCKING NECROPOST. Jesus christ you new guys are behind. It’s like you go all the way back to the last page and dig up something.

All the necroposts today was made by a bot called peckernod or something like that. Had an advertisement for a french site selling memory cards and Nintendo games in his sig. The account is now removed.

EDIT: Oh, and it seemed like it was digging up all threads with the word “favorite” in it. Also, all its posts started with “my favorite” or “mine favorite”.

Read full topic
item.source: What's your favorite game of all time?

item.title: What's your favorite game of all time?
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
cs_kimmo:

Yeah, maybe. But it’s an epic buzzkill when the game crashes because of my shitty nVidia 8400M GS overheating during the game Xbox shouldn’t have that problem, unless I get the legendary RRoD

If you have the newer XBox 360 models (the pro/elite consoles) and maybe a Nyko Intercooler EX, then it’s invincible.
I’ve had my XBox for a year and a half, and no Red Rings!

Read full topic
item.source: What's your favorite game of all time?

item.title: What's your favorite game of all time?
item.dc:creator: Firebringer
item.description:
honestly, my favorite games are:

  1. Starcraft, a fun game with an excellent story, and
  2. Half-life, a great FPS, with an extremely well written story.

item.title: What's your favorite game of all time?
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Doom. Kicking it old school, bitches. And before anyone says Wolfenstein 3D to one up me I played and enjoyed it but it wasn’t quite the classic Doom was a year or two later.

Read full topic

The PC version is actually a lot better.

item.title: What's your favorite game of all time?
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
SassyRobot:

Only game that comes close is Tetris, which is just amazing.
It really teaches you a lot about life itself and the score is just perfect.

Has to be the original C64 version though. Epic music.

item.description:

item.title: What's your favorite game of all time?
item.dc:creator: Trilby
item.description:
Morrowind
Monkey Island 1-3
HL & HL2 and everything related
Day of Defeat
Dark Messiah of Might and Magic
Shadow of the Colossus
Oblivion
Prince of Persia: Sands of Time, Warrior Within, The Two Thrones
Chrono Trigger
Civilization 1-3 and especially Call To Power 1
Prey

I think these are all that I liked most. In descending order

Read full topic

item.title: What's your favorite game of all time?
item.dc:creator: DCTN
item.description:
Heres mine

Half Life + All expansion packs.
Half Life 2 + All expansion packs.
Serious Sam The First + Second Encounter.
Heroes Of Might And Magic 3 + All expansion packs.
Heart Of Darkness.
Another World.
Abes Odyssey + Abes Exodus.
Unreal + UT + UT2004 + UT3.
Gears Of War 1 + 2.
